description: The 42-year-old former Victoria's Secret Angel showcased her slender figure in a sexy low-cut, shimmering fringe gown for the 73rd annual Golden Globes held at the Beverly Hilton Hotel
title: Golden Globe Awards red carpet welcomes Heidi Klum in a fringe gown
title_page: Golden Globe Awards red carpet welcomes Heidi Klum in a fringe gown | Daily Mail Online
text:
She's known for her daring red carpet looks.
And Heidi Klum didn't disappoint at the 73rd Annual Golden Globe Awards in Beverly Hills on Sunday.
The 42-year-old showcased her slender figure in a sexy low-cut, shimmering fringe Marchesa gown for the ceremony held at the Beverly Hilton Hotel.
Scroll down for video
Dazzling! Heidi Klum, 42, showcased her slender figure in a sexy low-cut, shimmering fringe Marchesa gown at the 73rd Annual Golden Globe Awards in Beverly Hills on Sunday
Showstopping! The former Victoria's Secret Angel's chic dress made sure to stand out from the crowd as she wore the number which revealed a bit of cleavage
Her eye-catching dress made sure to stand out from the crowd as she wore the number which revealed a bit of cleavage.
The couture piece was embedded with black geometric shapes beneath the textured fabric and cinched at the waist.
She swept her silky blonde locks back into a chic bun with a few wisps along her face and let the dress take centre stage.
See more of the latest red carpet pictures and videos from the 2016 Golden Globes
Chic! The couture piece was embedded with black geometric shapes beneath the textured fabric and cinched at the waist
Heidi kept her makeup neutral which highlighted her youthful appearance but added a pale pink lip for a pop of colour.
The former Victoria's Secret Angel accessorized her fashion with vintage diamond drop earrings and strappy silver heels.
Klum shared an Instagram snap of her Golden Globes preparations, where she thanked her team in the caption, which read: 'Redcarpet ready!'
'Redcarpet ready!' Heidi Klum gave a behind-the-scenes look of her preparations on Instagram on Sunday
The television host recently returned to Los Angeles as she spent her holiday break with her boyfriend Vito Schnabel.
The happy couple enjoyed a romantic holiday in St. Moritz, Switzerland before heading back to the U.S. on Tuesday.
The Project Runway star looked supermodel chic when she arrived in a long and luxurious-looking black furry coat over another lengthy black sweater, black jeans and shiny black boots.
Glamorous arrival! The television host recently returned to Los Angeles as she spent her holiday break with her boyfriend Vito Schnabel in St. Moritz, Switzerland
